sqrt_two_add_series_step_up:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem sqrt_two_add_series_step_up (c d : ℕ) {a b n : ℕ} {z : exprℝ} (hz : sqrt_two_add_series (c / d) n ≤ z)
    (hb : 0 < b) (hd : 0 < d) (h : (2 * b + a) * d ^ 2 ≤ c ^ 2 * b) : sqrt_two_add_series (a / b) (n + 1) ≤ z :=
  by
  refine' le_trans _ hz; rw [sqrt_two_add_series_succ]; apply sqrt_two_add_series_monotone_left
  have hb' : 0 < (b : exprℝ) := Nat.cast_pos.2 hb
  have hd' : 0 < (d : exprℝ) := Nat.cast_pos.2 hd
  rw [sqrt_le_left (div_nonneg c.cast_nonneg d.cast_nonneg), div_pow, add_div_eq_mul_add_div _ _ (ne_of_gt hb'),
    div_le_div_iff hb' (pow_pos hd' _)]
  exact_mod_cast h
#align sqrt_two_add_series_step_up sqrt_two_add_series_step_up
sqrt_two_add_series_step_down:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem sqrt_two_add_series_step_down (a b : ℕ) {c d n : ℕ} {z : exprℝ} (hz : z ≤ sqrt_two_add_series (a / b) n)
    (hb : 0 < b) (hd : 0 < d) (h : a ^ 2 * d ≤ (2 * d + c) * b ^ 2) : z ≤ sqrt_two_add_series (c / d) (n + 1) :=
  by
  apply le_trans hz; rw [sqrt_two_add_series_succ]; apply sqrt_two_add_series_monotone_left
  apply le_sqrt_of_sq_le
  have hb' : 0 < (b : exprℝ) := Nat.cast_pos.2 hb
  have hd' : 0 < (d : exprℝ) := Nat.cast_pos.2 hd
  rw [div_pow, add_div_eq_mul_add_div _ _ (ne_of_gt hd'), div_le_div_iff (pow_pos hb' _) hd']
  exact_mod_cast h
#align sqrt_two_add_series_step_down sqrt_two_add_series_step_down
pi_upper_bound_start:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/-- From a lower bound on `sqrt_two_add_series 0 n = 2 cos (π / 2 ^ (n+1))` of the form
`2 - ((a - 1 / 4 ^ n) / 2 ^ (n + 1)) ^ 2 ≤ sqrt_two_add_series 0 n`, one can deduce the upper bound
`π < a` thanks to basic trigonometric formulas as expressed in `pi_lt_sqrt_two_add_series`. -/
theorem pi_upper_bound_start (n : ℕ) {a}
    (h : 2 - ((a - 1 / 4 ^ n) / 2 ^ (n + 1)) ^ 2 ≤ sqrt_two_add_series ((0 : ℕ) / (1 : ℕ)) n) (h₂ : 1 / 4 ^ n ≤ a) :
    real.pi < a := by
  refine' lt_of_lt_of_le (pi_lt_sqrt_two_add_series n) _
  rw [← le_sub_iff_add_le, ← le_div_iff', sqrt_le_left, sub_le_comm]
  · rwa [Nat.cast_zero, zero_div] at h
  · exact div_nonneg (sub_nonneg.2 h₂) (pow_nonneg (le_of_lt zero_lt_two) _)
  · exact pow_pos zero_lt_two _
#align pi_upper_bound_start pi_upper_bound_start
pi_lt_sqrt_two_add_series:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
theorem pi_lt_sqrt_two_add_series (n : ℕ) : real.pi < 2 ^ (n + 1) * sqrt (2 - sqrt_two_add_series 0 n) + 1 / 4 ^ n :=
  by
  have : real.pi < (sqrt (2 - sqrt_two_add_series 0 n) / 2 + 1 / (2 ^ n) ^ 3 / 4) * 2 ^ (n + 2) :=
    by
    rw [← div_lt_iff, ← sin_pi_over_two_pow_succ]
    refine' lt_of_lt_of_le (lt_add_of_sub_right_lt (sin_gt_sub_cube _ _)) _
    · apply div_pos pi_pos
      apply pow_pos
      norm_num
    · rw [div_le_iff']
      · refine' le_trans pi_le_four _
        simp only [show (4 : exprℝ) = 2 ^ 2 by norm_num, mul_one]
        apply pow_le_pow
        norm_num
        apply le_add_of_nonneg_left
        apply nat.zero_le
      · apply pow_pos
        norm_num
    apply add_le_add_left
    rw [div_le_div_right]
    rw [le_div_iff, ← mul_pow]
    refine' le_trans _ (le_of_eq (one_pow 3))
    apply pow_le_pow_of_le_left
    · apply le_of_lt
      apply mul_pos
      apply div_pos pi_pos
      apply pow_pos
      norm_num
      apply pow_pos
      norm_num
    rw [← le_div_iff]
    refine' le_trans ((div_le_div_right _).mpr pi_le_four) _
    apply pow_pos
    norm_num
    rw [pow_succ, pow_succ, ← mul_assoc, ← div_div]
    convert le_rfl
    all_goals repeat' apply pow_pos; norm_num
  apply lt_of_lt_of_le this (le_of_eq _)
  rw [add_mul]
  congr 1
  · rw [pow_succ _ (n + 1), ← mul_assoc, div_mul_cancel, mul_comm]
    norm_num
  rw [pow_succ, ← pow_mul, mul_comm n 2, pow_mul, show (2 : exprℝ) ^ 2 = 4 by norm_num, pow_succ, pow_succ, ←
    mul_assoc (2 : exprℝ), show (2 : exprℝ) * 2 = 4 by norm_num, ← mul_assoc, div_mul_cancel,
    mul_comm ((2 : exprℝ) ^ n), ← div_div, div_mul_cancel]
  apply pow_ne_zero
  norm_num
  norm_num
#align pi_lt_sqrt_two_add_series pi_lt_sqrt_two_add_series

pi_lower_bound_start:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/-- From an upper bound on `sqrt_two_add_series 0 n = 2 cos (π / 2 ^ (n+1))` of the form
`sqrt_two_add_series 0 n ≤ 2 - (a / 2 ^ (n + 1)) ^ 2)`, one can deduce the lower bound `a < π`
thanks to basic trigonometric inequalities as expressed in `pi_gt_sqrt_two_add_series`. -/
theorem pi_lower_bound_start (n : ℕ) {a} (h : sqrt_two_add_series ((0 : ℕ) / (1 : ℕ)) n ≤ 2 - (a / 2 ^ (n + 1)) ^ 2) :
    a < real.pi := by
  refine' lt_of_le_of_lt _ (pi_gt_sqrt_two_add_series n); rw [mul_comm]
  refine' (div_le_iff (pow_pos (by norm_num) _ : (0 : exprℝ) < _)).mp (le_sqrt_of_sq_le _)
  rwa [le_sub_comm, show (0 : exprℝ) = (0 : ℕ) / (1 : ℕ) by rw [Nat.cast_zero, zero_div]]
#align pi_lower_bound_start pi_lower_bound_start

pi_gt_sqrt_two_add_series:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/

Authors: Floris van Doorn, Mario Carneiro

theorem pi_gt_sqrt_two_add_series (n : ℕ) : 2 ^ (n + 1) * sqrt (2 - sqrt_two_add_series 0 n) < real.pi :=
  by
  have : sqrt (2 - sqrt_two_add_series 0 n) / 2 * 2 ^ (n + 2) < real.pi :=
    by
    rw [← lt_div_iff, ← sin_pi_over_two_pow_succ]
    apply sin_lt
    apply div_pos pi_pos
    all_goals apply pow_pos; norm_num
  apply lt_of_le_of_lt (le_of_eq _) this
  rw [pow_succ _ (n + 1), ← mul_assoc, div_mul_cancel, mul_comm]
  norm_num
#align pi_gt_sqrt_two_add_series pi_gt_sqrt_two_add_series
